list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Add GitHub Actions workflow for npm publishing
This workflow automates the npm publishing process upon pushing to the master branch. It ensures dependencies are installed, the project is built, and only publishes if the package version is new.

task.summary:
Refactor and expand STAS SDK functionality
Replaced usage of Buffer with Bytes throughout the codebase for consistency and clarity. Enhanced the `stas-bundle-factory` to support funding UTXOs, adding new types and refactoring related logic. Introduced new Jest test configurations, scripts, and tests, alongside updates to dependencies and the build pipeline.

Add GitHub Actions workflow for npm publishing
This workflow automates the npm publishing process upon pushing to the master branch. It ensures dependencies are installed, the project is built, and only publishes if the package version is new.
